conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true cutaway 3D model: extruded walls with thickness, visible top/side faces, and an angled camera showing interior volume.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Clear wall height/thickness, readable corners, distinct floor plane, and clean cutaway. Minor simplification of some junction detailing.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall room layout matches (bedroom top-left, living/dining center-left, kitchen right, toilet near center-top, utility top-right, foyer bottom-right, balcony bottom-left). Some proportional drift and minor partition/opening placement differences, especially around kitchen/utility/foyer transitions.

interior_elements.notes: Bed, sofa, dining set, kitchen counters/cooktop, and bathroom fixtures present and generally placed in correct rooms; scales/orientations are plausible with minor simplification.

visual_clarity.notes: Geometry is readable with consistent materials and clean presentation. Lighting/shadows slightly reduce visibility in a few corners but do not obscure the plan.

detected_errors.description: Minor layout/proportion drift compared to 2D, most noticeable in the kitchen/utility/foyer area sizing and partition alignment.
Some door/window positions and swing/orientation appear simplified or not perfectly matched to the 2D plan (notably around internal doors and utility openings).
Shadowing slightly reduces edge clarity in a few interior corners.

summary: A true 3D cutaway conversion with strong overall layout fidelity, with only minor proportional and door/window placement deviations from the 2D plan.
